title: T206 near set available FS at the Nat'l
author: timn1

posts.post_title: T206 near set available FS at the Nat'l
posts.post_content:
Hi folks,
I have decided to bring my T206 (near-)set to the National.  It consists of 515 cards, lacks the big six and a few commons.  I don't plan to sell it except as a set.  Obviously I'm not going to give it away, but feel free to come by, take a look, and make an offer if you are inclined.  

Best,

Tim
